betterquesting:10.desc:8:
"Unmanned Mission" has the same process of launching a rocket but §ewithout you on-board§r. In order to execute such plan, you'd need to get the §6Rocket Monitoring Station§r. This machine is used to §emonitor the unmanned rocket§r, giving you information of §eit's altitude§r, §evelocity§r and §efuel§r. It can also §elaunch the rocket remotely with a click of a button§e in the machine's GUI.

To connect the said machine to an assembled rocket, you'd need a §6Linker§r. Link both of them together and they will work §ewirelessly throughout all planets§r.

It's commonly used to send §6Satellite Bay§r to space.

To make the Rocket Monitoring Station, you'll need six §6Copper Rod§rs, a §6Machine Structure§r, a Battery (§7known in §eJEI§7 by §6item.battery.0.name§r), and an §6Optical Sensor§r.
